title: 05/31: Backfields to Avoid; Teammate Combos (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Bottom five OL in the NFL (1:50)! Which lines will be terrible in 2018? Are there backfields we are simply avoiding in drafts (9:30)? ... We put Ezekiel Elliott under a microscope (12:45) and discuss the upside and downside of drafting Zeke. Is there any chance he is a bust this year? Also Dave eats something that sounds gross but isn't (17:35), Jamey gives an awesome Russell Wilson stat (19:15) and we take you through the NFL news (21:45) ... Teammate combos (29:03)! Devonta Freeman and Julio Jones vs. Kareem Hunt and Tyreek HIll. Todd Gurley and Brandin Cooks vs. Ronald Jones and Mike Evans, plus more! ... Listener voicemails (40:22) as we try to make a realistic Fantasy dream team ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
